Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #N5 South Shore Night Bus Temporary Reroute at Jeffery/68th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#N5 South Shore Night buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffery, 73rd, Stony Island, 67th and Jeffery, due to street blockage near Jeffery/68th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/Kinzie
ShortDescription: SB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Hubbard, Paulina, Carrol and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Kinzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Hubbard, Paulina, Carrol and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Kinzie.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
